## ClipboardHelper class

Copy helper for text/richtext/image.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ClipboardHelper extends BasicTool 
```
**Extends:** [BasicTool](./zotero-plugin-toolkit.basictool.md)

## Example 1

Copy plain text

```ts
new ClipboardHelper().addText("plain", "text/unicode").copy();
```

## Example 2

Copy plain text &amp; rich text

```ts
new ClipboardHelper().addText("plain", "text/unicode")
                    .addText("<h1>rich text</h1>", "text/html")
                    .copy();
```

## Example 3

Copy plain text, rich text &amp; image

```ts
new ClipboardHelper().addText("plain", "text/unicode")
                    .addText("<h1>rich text</h1>", "text/html")
                    .addImage("data:image/png;base64,...")
                    .copy();
```
